title: Is Soudal Quick-Step’s Reworked 2025 Roster Strong Enough for Evenepoel to Challenge Pogačar?
content:
Soudal Quick-Step closes roster with 30 riders: No blockbusters, but plenty of fresh legs to help Evenepoel's big ambitions for 2025.

Read the full article at Is Soudal Quick-Step’s Reworked 2025 Roster Strong Enough for Evenepoel to Challenge Pogačar? on Velo.
author: ahood
